item.title: Crypto Crime — Tortured And Burned Alive For A Password
item.description: When your password costs you your life. Cybercrime turns physical as crypto wrench attack victim pays the ultimate price.

item.title: World Health Organization Recommends GLP-1 Drugs Like Ozempic For Obesity. Here’s What To Know
item.description: The World Health Organization conditionally recommended GLP-1 drugs for obesity. A physician breaks down what you need to know about this historic ann...

item.title: ‘Destiny 2: Renegades’ Review: Let The Past Die
item.description: Destiny 2's new Renegades expansion is out, heavily influenced by Star Wars. Is it the entry Destiny 2 needs in this troubled era of the game?

item.title: Scarlett Johansson’s Potential Role In ‘The Batman Part II’ Is Baffling
item.description: Scarlett Johansson is on the verge of joining The Batman Part II, but even with so many characters, it seems very hard to parse who she'd be.

item.title: Garmin InReach Mini 3 Offers Fenix 8 Pro Features For Less
item.description: Garmin has released a new range of satellite communicator, headed up by the Garmin inReach Mini 3 will support for photos and voice notes.
